description:
Prefer to go fast and light? You need boots that can keep up. With lightweight construction and a high-rebound midsole, the VECTIV Fastpack Mid is up to the task. A woven mesh upper wraps your foot in breathable comfort, and a FutureLight™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry when rain breaks out at the viewpoint.

  • Woven mesh upper with TPU-overlays for durability without the weight
  • VECTIV technology stabilizes your foot over rough terrain, while providing energy-return and forward propulsion
  • FutureLight™ waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable
  • Gusseted tongue keeps debris out
  • TPU toecap adds durability and toe protection, and a 3D TPU plate stabilizes the foot
  • Removable OrthoLite® X55™ footbed for underfoot comfort
  • Mid-height Lycra® collar supports and stabilizes your ankle
  • Supportive EVA midsole with rocker geometry provides a smooth step
  • Surface Control™ outsole with 4mm lugs sticks to whatever the trail throws at you
name: The North Face Vectiv Fastpack Mid Futurelight Hiking Boots - Men's
